description: This file defines a React component named TopBar for a note management application's frontend interface. The component includes search, sort, toggle view/edit, and new note functionalities, along with a logo.

methods.name: TopBar
methods.description: React functional component rendering a top navigation bar with search, sort, toggle view/edit, and new note buttons.

methods.name: Logo
methods.description: A subcomponent rendering the application logo.
